events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for this customer.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number to proceed with the refund?
Sure, here is the photo of the item and my order number: 123456. Please let me know if you need any more information.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund and send you a prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for your quick response and the solution. I appreciate the prepaid return label and refund.
The refund has been authorized and the return label sent. Your case is now resolved.
Just checking in to confirm you've received your refund and the return process went smoothly.
Since everything has been successfully resolved, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
